mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_product (name, type, price, img) VALUES (#{name}, #{type}, #{price}, #{img})
mapper.update: UPDATE t_product SET name = #{name}, type = #{type}, price = #{price}, img = #{img} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM t_product ORDER BY id ASC
SELECT * FROM t_product WHERE type = "coffee" ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT * FROM t_product WHERE type = "dessert" ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT * FROM t_product WHERE name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{name},'%')

SELECT p.name, p.price, p.img, p.type, c.id as commentId, c.user_id, c.rating, c.comment, (SELECT name FROM t_user WHERE id = c.user_Id) userName, (SELECT COUNT(rating) FROM t_comment WHERE product_id = p.id) as commentCnt, (SELECT AVG(rating) FROM t_comment WHERE product_id = p.id) as avg, (SELECT SUM(quantity) FROM t_order_detail WHERE product_id = p.id) as sells FROM t_product p LEFT JOIN t_comment c ON p.id = c.product_id WHERE p.id = #{productId} ORDER BY c.id DESC
SELECT AVG(cm.rating) as 'rating', cm.product_id as 'id', p.name, p.price, p.img FROM t_comment cm, t_product p WHERE cm.product_id = p.id GROUP BY p.id ORDER BY AVG(cm.rating) DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT SUM(od.quantity) as 'sells', od.product_id as 'id', p.name, p.price, p.img FROM t_order_detail od, t_product p WHERE od.product_id = p.id GROUP BY p.id ORDER BY SUM(od.quantity) DESC LIMIT 10;

SELECT p.id, p.name, p.img, p.price * od.quantity as sales, p.type, avg(c.rating) as rating FROM t_product as p left join t_order_detail as od on p.id = od.product_id left join t_comment as c on p.id = c.product_id WHERE p.id = od.product_id GROUP BY p.id;
